mapper.select: SELECT g.COURSE_NUMBER, g.STUDENT_ID, g.UNIVERSITY, GRADE, SEMESTER, e.COURSE_NAME, c.COURSE_INFO, c.CREDIT, c.PROFESSOR FROM REGISTRATION e INNER JOIN GRADE g ON e.STUDENT_ID = g.STUDENT_ID and e.COURSE_NUMBER = g.COURSE_NUMBER and e.UNIVERSITY = g.UNIVERSITY INNER JOIN COURSE c ON g.COURSE_NUMBER = c.COURSE_NUMBER WHERE g.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND g.UNIVERSITY = #{university} ORDER BY e.SEMESTER DESC;

SELECT (SUM(CASE g.grade WHEN 'A+' THEN 4.5*c.credit WHEN 'A0' THEN 4.0*c.credit WHEN 'B+' THEN 3.5*c.credit WHEN 'B0' THEN 3.0*c.credit WHEN 'C+' THEN 2.5*c.credit WHEN 'C0' THEN 2.0*c.credit WHEN 'D+' THEN 1.5*c.credit WHEN 'D0' THEN 1.0*c.credit WHEN 'NP' THEN 0 END)/ SUM(CASE g.grade WHEN 'P' THEN 0 ELSE c.credit END)) as temp FROM REGISTRATION e INNER JOIN GRADE g ON e.STUDENT_ID = g.STUDENT_ID and e.COURSE_NUMBER = g.COURSE_NUMBER and e.UNIVERSITY = g.UNIVERSITY INNER JOIN COURSE c ON g.COURSE_NUMBER = c.COURSE_NUMBER WHERE g.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND g.UNIVERSITY = #{university} ORDER BY e.SEMESTER DESC;

SELECT (SUM(CASE g.grade WHEN 'P' THEN 0 ELSE c.credit END)) as temp FROM REGISTRATION e INNER JOIN GRADE g ON e.STUDENT_ID = g.STUDENT_ID and e.COURSE_NUMBER = g.COURSE_NUMBER and e.UNIVERSITY = g.UNIVERSITY INNER JOIN COURSE c ON g.COURSE_NUMBER = c.COURSE_NUMBER WHERE g.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND g.UNIVERSITY = #{university} ORDER BY e.SEMESTER DESC;

SELECT SUM(CASE g.grade WHEN 'A+' THEN 4.5*c.credit WHEN 'A0' THEN 4.0*c.credit WHEN 'B+' THEN 3.5*c.credit WHEN 'B0' THEN 3.0*c.credit WHEN 'C+' THEN 2.5*c.credit WHEN 'C0' THEN 2.0*c.credit WHEN 'D+' THEN 1.5*c.credit WHEN 'D0' THEN 1.0*c.credit WHEN 'NP' THEN 0 END) as SUMGRADE FROM REGISTRATION e INNER JOIN GRADE g ON e.STUDENT_ID = g.STUDENT_ID and e.COURSE_NUMBER = g.COURSE_NUMBER and e.UNIVERSITY = g.UNIVERSITY INNER JOIN COURSE c ON g.COURSE_NUMBER = c.COURSE_NUMBER WHERE g.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND g.UNIVERSITY = #{university} ORDER BY e.SEMESTER DESC;
